with half-fare card / GA* Ticket Kriens–Krienseregg** 10.00 5.00 Buy Kriens–Krienseregg–Kriens** 20.00 10.00 Buy Kriens–Fräkmüntegg** 20.00 10.00 Buy Kriens–Fräkmüntegg–Kriens** 40.00 20.00 Buy Krienseregg–Fräkmüntegg–Krienseregg** 20.00 10.00 Buy Fräkmüntegg–Pilatus Kulm–Fräkmüntegg** 38.00 19.00 Buy Alpnachstad–Ämsigen** 27.00 13.50 Buy Alpnachstad–Pilatus Kulm–Fräkmüntegg** 58.00 29.00 Buy Ämsigen–Pilatus Kulm** 27.00 13.50 Buy

* Excluding municipal day tickets, special-offer day tickets and any other SBB savings offers and day passes.

** Only available at PILATUS-BAHNEN AG.

Groups of 10 or more receive a discount on route tickets. The discount is only available on the day of travel on site. All group prices (incl. reservation fee) can be found on our detailed price list.

CHF Adults 310.00 Family (with own children from 6 - 15.99 years) 620.00 Dogs*** 80.00

*** Only available in combination with an annual ticket for adults.

The Annual Pass is available at the Pilatus-Bahnen ticket offices in Kriens and Alpnachstad and at the Pilatus Shop Lucerne. You can find more information here.
